overview:
CEO and founder of Fruition LTD, an Israeli investing house.

I have more than 10 years of experience in the High-tech & Startup sector and have an MBA in Strategy & Finance from the ‘Miclala Leminhal’, an Israeli Collage. I’ve founded Fruition in late 2004, which over the years led & funded thousands of high-tech companies and raised millions of dollars for leading startups. Click here for some of Fruition’s successes.

Over the years we accompanied High-Tech companies from a variety of fields, some of them from the early stage of constructing the business strategy (such as www.ticket2final.com) and some of them after they approved their initial sales and began looking for the next investment round in order to become a market leader (such as www.applicure.com). These companies and startups went through our screening process and accompanying through finalizing their next investment round.

As an investing house we are constantly looking for the next startup and innovation which after our careful screening could be presented to our boutique of investors. Alongside, we will be glad to collaborate with private investors, investing houses, and VC’s in locating the right investment for them, fitting their investing requirements and preferences.

Fruition offers investors a diverse range of investments in start-ups and High Tech companies in a variety of business fields such as: medical devices, IT, web applications and on-line advertising, Some had began sales, received certifications (FDA, CE and etc.) and were listed in the TASE.

The long & deep experience with High-tech companies over the years, provides us with a based knowhow to screen and locate High-Tech companies in the appropriate life cycle, with minimum risk and the right opportunity for Fruition’s boutique investors.

Good luck, Kfir Hazaz, CEO Fruition LTD
